attr.title: Dark Deity
attr.desc: Step into the world of Terrazael and lead soon-to-be legendary heroes in a quest to restore a land fractured by broken oaths, reckless wars, and untamed magic. Fight back in turn-based battles, manage character relationships, collect dangerous artifacts, and hopefully restore the world...
attr.inst: Buy the game on gog or steam. Copy all game assets to `darkdeity/assets`.
